data.title: Negro Parents, Black Children
data.meta_description: We start our exploration of race relations in Brazil by taking a close look at racial terminology: its internal logic, and how it has evolved throughout history. To provide context for this inquiry, I shall begin with a general overview of the socio-economic position...
data.text:
Racial amalgamation has gone far in Brazil.

—Everett Stonequist, The Marginal Man

I am a black man of brown color.

—Miguel, 19, student
